title: Start New Water Service
description: A new resident who just moved into town needs to set up water and sewer service at their new address.

tasks.description: Gather the resident's name, service address, and contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately collects the new customer's details.

tasks.description: Verify the identity of the new resident.
Create a new utility account and schedule a technician to turn on the water service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the account and schedules the service activation.
